comments.body: in #38614 some tests were changed. so I guess we should also be checking the result as well as that a warning is raised.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +17,21 @@        msg = "without passing data"
        with tm.assert_produces_warning(FutureWarning, match=msg):
            CategoricalIndex(categories=list("abcd"), ordered=False)

    def test_construction_disallows_scalar(self):
